author: gmazza
msg: Removed duplication of pageNumber & pageNumberString in PSLM;

LM.getCurrentPageViewport()  (latter giving access to the former.)

msg: Pulled out the AreaTreeHandler from the LayoutManager interface, only
its LayoutManagerMaker (now included) was being called.

author: gmazza
msg: Moved page viewport creation logic from PSLM to PageViewport.

author: gmazza
msg: Removed the curSpan instance variable -- now obtainable via curPage.
